Package com.gliffy.restunit.http

Classes to encapsulate the mechanism for making and resolving HTTP requests

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Http Generic interface to HTTP protocol.
 

Class Summary
ContentType Handles accepting a string content type and exposing the encoded mime type and character encoding.
HttpRequest Encapsulates an HTTP request.
HttpRequestFactory This class produces HttpRequest objects based upon RestCall objects.
HttpResponse Encapsulates an HTTP response.
JavaHttp Implementation that uses the HttpURLConnection class.
 

Package com.gliffy.restunit.http Description

Classes to encapsulate the mechanism for making and resolving HTTP requests
